text: This is a list of noted ecologist from Europe. ==Bosnia-Herzegovinia== *Smilja Mučibabić, one of the founders of the Faculty of Science at University of Sarajevo; d. 2006 ==Estonia== *Hans Trass ==Finland== *Ilkka Hanski, was (as of 2010) the seventh most cited ecologist in the world; d. 2016 ==Germany== *Ernst Haeckel, d. 1919 *Wilhelm Knabe, member of parliament; d. 2021 ==Russia== *Vasiliy Mihaylovich Peskov, was on UNEP's list Global 500 Roll of Honour; got the Lenin Prize; d. 2013 *Marina Rikhvanova, got the Goldman Environmental PrizeBrave Environmentalist Wins ‘Green Nobel’ ==United Kingdom== :Pages appear in :Category:British ecologists ==Related pages== *List of ecologists ==References== Category:Lists of scientists *
title: List of ecologists from Europe
